description: Personal AI assistant — Gateway control plane with multi-channel inbox (WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack... OpenClaw is a self-hosted application focused on ai, tools, utility, self-hosted. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host OpenClaw on your home server to personal ai assistant — gateway control plane with multi-channel inbox (whatsapp, telegram, slack.. without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use OpenClaw to manage your ai workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
